entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
